weight (up To 9 Oz.) Good Semisweet Chocolate
weight (up To 9 Oz.) Good Bittersweet Chocolate
Acorn Squash, Cut Into 8 Wedges Each

name: Pear Crisp with Vanilla Ice Cream

ingredients.name: White Button Mushrooms, Washed And Stems Removed
(to 5) Green Onions, Sliced (up To Middle Of Dark Green Part)
4 Oz Cans Whole Green Chilies, Diced
Rotel Diced Green Chilies And Tomatoes (10 Ounce Can)
Low Sodium Chicken Broth (more If Needed)
Roasted, Peeled, And Seeded Green Chiles
(12 Fl Oz) Evaporated Milk, Or Half Milk And Half Cream
Pumpkin Puree, Or More To Taste
Ground Cloves, Or More To Taste (optional)
Ground Ginger Or Grated Fresh Ginger, To Taste (optional)

name: Shrimp Pasta in a Foil Package

ingredients.name: Jumbo Or Large Shrimp, Peeled And Deveined
(generous) Cranberry Sauce (homemade Or Canned Is Fine!)
weight Pitted Dates, Chopped Coarsely (around 1 1/2 Cups)
Medium Onions, Cut In Half And Sliced Thin
Crusty French Bread, Cut Into 1-inch Cubes
Fryer Chicken, Cut Up (or 3 Cups Cooked Chicken)
